website_summaries.verdict: Vasque satisfied newbies and experts with its reasonably priced Snowblime UltraDry winter hiking boot. Its warmth, support, and accurate sizing enabled outdoor lovers to cover more miles even in cold conditions. However, it failed to please in terms of weight and break-in period. To conclude, if its rather reconcilable setbacks can be overlooked, the Vasque Snowblime UltraDry would make a good winter trail companion.
pros: A huge deal of recreational hikers lauded the warmth given by the Snowblime UltraDry
Its reasonable price received appreciation from a majority of online buyers
According to hordes of satisfied wearers, the waterproofing of the Vasque UltraDry was superb
It runs true to size, based on numerous user reviews
Plenty of owners were in awe with its grip on snowy ground conditions
The ankle support of the UltraDry Snowblime from Vasque impressed an experienced backpacker
A gear reviewer approved of its spacious toe box
cons: A couple of hikers were disheartened with the extended break-in period of the Vasque Snowblime UltraDry
Several wearers expressed disappointment over its hefty weight

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Boots were nice and seemed well made. The size in length was good however the right foot was painfully narrow and the left foot felt fine. My feet are not that different in width. In fact there was a time when my left foot was wider as that was the flatter foot. I have had other Vasque boots without a similar issue and have not had this issue with any other shoe. If it was too narrow it was too narrow for both feet.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Fit just like my old Vasque Calrion GTX boots. I've always had a problem with cold feet when I wear my regular hiking boots in the winter. However, these have kept my feet warm down to -4F as long as I was active. My feet have gotten cold in these when I've just stood around on snow/ice w/o being active, but no where near as bad as my old boots. But remember, these are hiking boots designed for activity, not ice fishing boots meat for inactivity standing on ice. Perfect for their design, winter hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Best winter hiking boots I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: After two winters and many miles of walking and heavy duty hiking, snowshoeing and use of traction devices on ice these boots are the most rugged, warmest and, most importantly, the driest I’ve ever had. Just hoping they are still available when I’m ready for a new pair of hikers. They are also quite comfortable in mild and even warm conditions.
customer_reviews.author: EdCon0055321

customer_reviews.title: Colder temperatures will be the real test, but so far I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my boots for about two weeks now, and so far they're as I expected. No cold toes is always a good sign! We haven't had really cold temperatures yet, but in Utah if you don't like the weather, wait a few minutes. Winter will eventually arrive and I'll be able to put these boots to the real test. I've had Vasque boots in the past, and they've always been good, solid, long wearing boots. I'm hoping that these will be as good. So far, I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Hook 'em DanO

customer_reviews.title: My new everyday boots.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair 8 months ago and liked them so much I bought another pair. They are my new everyday boots to wear. But then I live in Alaska so the 200 gram thinsulate is perfect. I also have a pair of Vasque Snoburban with the 400gram for hunting and snow machining. I'm very happy with these Vasque boots and their price point. They work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots - getting another pair
customer_reviews.text: I spent several very cold winter days in the woods and these boots, along with a pair of wool socks, kept my feet warm and dry with out being too heavy. My son has been wearing them all summer working in a sub-zero ice cream warehouse and no complaints of cold feet. A great alternative to heavy work or hunting boots.
customer_reviews.author: flashbang65

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: First pair of these lasted 7 years ! These are even better. A real boot feel, solid and supportive. I use these as an all around boot for ski area wear, snow shoeing, snow scooping. Give great lateral support. Feel like boots, not tenny runners. BTW the laces suck. I use a $6 roll of parcord to make new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot
customer_reviews.text: This was my second winter using them and they impress me still. they keep my feet toasty warm and dry. The weight is also excellent, legs do not get tired after long hikes using these. I sometimes have trouble with the fit of my boots at first but these fit perfect right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Linus Mickus

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight but sturdy well constructed boot. Warm but not bulky. I love them and im bout a half size bigger on my ordered size, which is perfect. So get them little bigger than your normal and enjoy. They look stylish and are funtional. Pricey but worth it..!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these beasts!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beasts! No need for wool socks with these rugged and warm boots. I’ve had these for the past 2 winters in Nebraska and I couldn’t be happier with them. You’re feet will feel indestructible in these while staying warm and dry. They are stiff so if you want something that moves with your foot more like a low cut shoe then you will have some adjusting to do. I wear and size 13 and these run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rush

customer_reviews.title: The only boots whose footbed fits my feet
customer_reviews.text: I tried Keen and Timberland boots and these were the only ones where the arch was positioned correctly for my feet. It was too far forward on Keen and Timberland. I had almost given up hope. I will try these in St. Petersburg, Russia this winter and post something then about how they perform in a Russian winter. That will be a real test.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. Denny

customer_reviews.title: 200 miles!
customer_reviews.text: 60 miles right out of box, took about 10 miles to break in and then they squeaked for about another 5 miles. Have well over 200 miles now and are best feeling boots ever!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly gleason

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks and laces
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great. They developed a squeak about 10 days into wearing them. As I purchased them for a hunting trip, you can imagine that didn't sit well. The squeak lasted about 3 weeks then disappeared, likely once they were broken in. The laces came apart early on as well, about 2 weeks is all they lasted. Replaced with 550 cord and all is well. They are warm, waterproof, and finally quiet. All in all, a great boot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality boot for the money. I love Vasque products. True to size, IMO, and very sturdy and solidly built footwear. Fits my feet perfectly and very warm and comfortable, especially with medium weight merino wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H

customer_reviews.title: Worth the gamble!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this boot a try for the first time and the fit was perfect right of the box. Ive used these boots 6-7 days a week for at least 8 hours a day in all weather and terrain conditions for 9 months now. They keep my feet warm, dry and with less fatique. The only downside that i can find isnt even with the boot. Sadly, buying another pair will cost 40$ more then original purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Initial review: Great boot. Warm for sure. Fits narrow however. Length is true to size. Will revisit this review after sufficient break-in time. Update: The boots fit better after allowing them to break in (a few days). Narrowness is no longer a concern. However, the height of the boot causes discomfort on my left foot where the tongue rubs against my inside ankle. Readjusting the tongue helps. Will revisit this after a couple weeks. Update 2: Great boots! No complaints after sufficient break-in time. Changed 4 stars to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: The Vasques are great for cold weather hiking just enough insulation
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair. I usually bought Asolo all leather for winter hiking and I'm not knocking them just happened to buy these because my size was out. The Vasques are great for cold weather hiking just enough insulation, and still not cumbersome if ya know what I mean. The definitely keep you dry, I wear them to make snow and thry haven't let me down they don't freeze up like leather
customer_reviews.author: Jack Spelman

customer_reviews.title: Boots are way too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly stiff, the other reviewers were not wrong. This boot will make you walk awkwardly and with loud steps. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Measure Once

customer_reviews.title: Great boot under 200
customer_reviews.text: I am tough in boots having worn work boots my whole life I looked for a comfortable presentable boot for both casual work place meetings as well as on th trail. These boots meet and exceed my expectations these are my Second set of Vasque I will buy and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerv vb

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails, built to last
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these boots that I have ordered for my 14-year-old son. He is currently on an 80 mile wilderness canoe trip and is probably wearing these boots to do all his canoeing and portaging. Did I mention he is extremely hard on his shoes... Lol. He absolutely loves them for their comfort and I love them for their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are happy
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these winter hikers changed my view of cold weather activities to be very positive. Great for hiking and especially snowshoeing.
customer_reviews.author: Vibram Soul

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warm fit good however you can't cinch them up too snug because the tongue digs into your ankles
customer_reviews.author: geoff

customer_reviews.title: Well built and made to last
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, last Ia very long time. Wont buy anything else
customer_reviews.author: joseph d garwood

customer_reviews.title: A very satisfied returning customer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to replace a similar pair of Vasque hiking boots that have served me well for the last twelve years.
customer_reviews.author: Jmc7228

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing bad to say about these boots
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 10.5 narrow heel backwoods / bushwack hiker. These boots are fabulous. I’ve been out for hours in single digit temps, and my feet are toasty warm. I’ve stepped into water, and my feet stay dry. I’ve used them with my MSR Evo Ascent snowshoes and my Hillsound Trail Crampon. They’ve got a firm but grippy sole. I have nothing bad to say about these boots.
customer_reviews.author: G S Barone

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of winter boots if you live in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of winter boots if you live in a snow state and want to keep your feet dry and worm when playing in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: great boot. Super warm and insulated
customer_reviews.text: great boot. Super warm and insulated. My husband does construction in Idaho where there's many feet of snow on the ground and these have kept him warm and dry all winter and will last at least another winter or two.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great winter hiking boots.
customer_reviews.text: Living in Montana with 3 feet of snow and 20 below zero temps. Which leads to constant walking, shoveling, and freezing my ass off. At least my feet were warm and dry. And they have great snow and ice traction.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: They past the test! My feet were warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lee comfortable and your feet stay warm ! Last week it was -22 with wind chills of. -50 that's right! I live in Indiana these boots past the test my feet stand dry the hole day
customer_reviews.author: Clay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly! Very warm and great traction. Love the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Brokenfoot Idaho

customer_reviews.title: but I think he will enjoy them once that occurs
customer_reviews.text: Present for son. He is having to break them in tops are stiff and really don't bend, but I think he will enjoy them once that occurs. In the mean time his feet will be a lot warmer in his northern climate. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Great all around boot
customer_reviews.text: I waiver between a 9.5 and 10 and this boot fits great no matter what thickness of sock I am wearing. They work great in my snowshoes and are comfortable to walk around in for hours. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bee seriously

customer_reviews.title: Decent boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot tall enough to slip them on with out lacing them up. Very supportive when you do. Wish they were a little warmer(below 20) been post holing through the snow when walking the dog. They are dry and warm enough for an hour or so
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Stiff competition
customer_reviews.text: Warm and dry. Excellent look, though the feel isn't quite perfect. Length is correct (size 14), however the width is a little more narrow than I expected. Thus the right boot is a little snug, however, considering that these boots are rather stiff when brand new, I suspect that a few more treks in them will break them in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: HeyZeusCryst

customer_reviews.title: ... quality and comfort of these boots and i was fortunate enough to get them at a discount
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the quality and comfort of these boots and i was fortunate enough to get them at a discount. They arrived on time meeting every description perfectly. Great company to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Top quality boots. Ride my motorcycle under a heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Top quality boots. Ride my motorcycle under a heavy rail over a lot of poodles in Colombia and they keep my feet dry and warm. If you live in places with 20°C maybe they are too warm
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Andres Tache

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Boot
customer_reviews.text: Although the quality was nice they are very stiff hard boot ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wore these for a day of snowshoeing on Mt. Rainier straight out of the box and said they were very comfortable and warm. But not too warm, so they will be good for at least 3 seasons of the year and possibly all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: This is a good boot for everyday cold weather field use. I like how Vasque boots fit me as I’ve worn several types for years ( I have narrow feet). You can buy better, but these are solid boots for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Parker

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few days, but fit is good, keeps my feet warmer than i expected. It appears the build quality is also better than expected. I like.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a wide shoe, but this fit fine - I ordered it due to the extra insulation for cold and it works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Lou Dag

customer_reviews.title: Great boot !
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what was looking for ! Great boot, fits perfect. One of the best footwear used !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice winter weather boot!
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots so far. Replaced the vasques insole with wool for the winter. Toasty warm and really comfortable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: A bit stiff at first but now they are breaking in nicely. Keeping my feet warm and dry, excellent traction. They feel very solidly built, hoping they'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good and the boots are warm and seem to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot, warm & comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. Fit perfect. They do need to break in though. Irritation around top of boot. Once broken in I think they'll be great.
customer_reviews.author: Keith F.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable uppers
customer_reviews.text: Style and looks were great. The only reason I didn’t keep them was the uppers were stiff and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great winter boot for delivering mail. Now the search continues for the perfect winter socks to wick away sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent warm waterproof boots. I walk 5 miles a day in them. Always comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Very warm. Very dry. Lightweight. Enjoy wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Brento

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot
customer_reviews.text: So far best boots ever! Sometimes can be a bit to warm with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Keith brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots will try this brand. Seams to me very strong
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Grecco

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Had many pairs of Vasque shoes, first insulated/waterproof pair. Quality and fit are what I have come to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Got these for winter hiking. Will update after a few hikes. Seem well made. The fit, which is extremely important, was spot on. I wear 9s men's. I got the in 9.5 and I have just enough room for a mid weight pair of wool socks. Toes can wiggle, fit is good! I can lace up and kick the floor and not have my toes get stubbed. This is key for long term comfort and walking down steep hills. The only potential issue I can see: breathability. The sides of the toung is the only part of the boot that has a breathable fabric. The rest of the boot is basically rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Team bear

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to send these back. Not wide enough and somewhat stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the comfortable fit-they are used for work on days when it is snowy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I have two more pairs. That is all I ever wear. RJ
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble finding boots that fit. These were perfect out of the box. Much sturdier than my merrells. Can't wait to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: mattyg

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the fit is great and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Love them, just wish they were more brownish in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them, just wish they were more brownish in color than green. Feet have never been wet or cold with these!!
customer_reviews.author: commonsense 995

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Love the tread pattern as it sheds ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Love the tread pattern as it sheds snow better than the traditional Vibram type. Also very "snugable" around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Vasque boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot, first day out of the box I wore them on a 5 mile hike in the snow. My feet stayed warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnmn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit every time, Vasque boots are great 5th pair I have purchased and won't be my last...
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them like other vasque shoes I've purchased ,give me some snow.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Snow
customer_reviews.text: I really dont want to give these a bad review because they do just what they say they will.... There Snow boots and would be perfect for that. I bought them as my regular boots but found out they were really stiff and felt like they would take a long time to wear in. They were also heavy. So I did send mine back But if your going hunting out in the moutains where there's lots of snow or water I think these would be great boot's
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot but returned as it was too narrow. Vasque makes a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, comfortable, looking forward to trying them out in the snow...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these hoots, fit perfect and are solid construction, but are comfortable on your feet the first time you put them on. They are stiff at first so make sure you break them in by wearing them around town for a week or so before you take them out on the trail. They are waterproof and work great with gaiters too. They also keep your toes warm.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent snow boot that really IS waterproof. They fit really nice and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Feet stay warm and dry. Sitting still in negative 20° feet will get cold but moving around my feet stayed warm. I would have given 5 starts but some of the non important stitches came undone on the inside of the tongue. Which at around a month old is not a good sign for longevity
customer_reviews.author: XxSnoZBeRRieSxX

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots were okay in dry conditions. First time I wore them in wet challenging conditions they leaked badly.
customer_reviews.author: jaybird0930

customer_reviews.title: Nice lacing system
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for cold snowy weather and they met the challenge. Nice lacing system, easy to get in and out of and nice cushioning at the top of the boot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R Cestaro

customer_reviews.title: I wore cotton socks on a cold winter day with ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore cotton socks on a cold winter day with lots of wet snow and 2" deep puddles on the hiking trail...my feet stayed dry and warm. This was my first day wearing them for a three hour hike without an feet fatigue or blisters. The snow was more than 12" deep, so some snow fell into the top portion of the boot but small and insignificant to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Quality seemed good from the very short time I had them
customer_reviews.text: Had to send them back for the fit. Not going to slam them in the review because that's just the way it is when you buy boots online. Quality seemed good from the very short time I had them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Too big, bulky and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking boot. I normally wear a 13/14 depending on brands. I ordered a 14 because boots/shoes now days seem to run smaller than expected. This felt like a 15/16 wide! Also there is a ton of room in the toe box, width and strangely height too. In addition these boots are very heavy at almost 5 pounds, much heavier than my old merrell's, just too uncomfortably heavy, with a lot of slop even after lacing them as tight as possible. These might be ok if you order your normal size and wear them with two layers of winter socks, but you're feet with be roasting. I'm returning these for something else lighter and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: The Trusty Reviewer 📦

customer_reviews.title: This company deserves to be sued
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst shoes I have ever bought. Is it too much to ask for shoes that don't destroy your feet after wearing them for just a day? I wouldn't keep this trash if it were free.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer / Designer

customer_reviews.title: Keep toes warm
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely warm boot. If you are looking for something to wear in snowy very cold weather these are great. They are very stiff at first so I recommend wearing them for a break in time before taking off on a long hike. Also they are high on the ankle so work on 6 or less inches of snow but would not be good in really deep snow.
customer_reviews.author: Ardell

product_meta.title: Vasque mens Snowblime UltraDry-M Snowblime Ultradry-m
product_meta.description: Life will be bliss with the comfortable protection of the Snowblime UltraDry™ boot by Vasque®. Waterproof leather and textile upper. CuShin technology minimizes the pressure on the shin from the top of the boot tongue. Perpetuum Last provides a comfortable fit for steady, long-distance endeavors. Fleece-lined collar helps keep out the cold. UltraDry™ membrane provides waterproof protection to keep your feet dry. 200 grams of 3M Thinsulate™ Ultra is a lightweight insulation that offers excellent warmth and comfort. Molded EVA midsole and TPU shank offer low-weight performance, while providing excellent stability and comfort. Vasque Venture outsole offers excellent traction in cold weather conditions and easily sheds mud and snow. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 3⁄4 in Weight: 1 lb 11 oz Circumference: 12 in Shaft: 6 in Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Waterproof snow boot featuring padded collar with pull-on loop at back and lace-up closure with speed-lace hardware at top
